welcome_message_body: Welcome to West University Place, where southern charm meets modern sophistication. Known for its beautiful tree-lined streets and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of William P Hobby Airport. It houses the check-in counters, baggage claim area, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at William P Hobby Airport serves as the gateway for international flights to and from the United States.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'HOU-Free-WiFi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Houston Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at West Houston Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ellington Field Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Ellington Field Airport is used for military operations and training.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The newest terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, dedicated to international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
